# Peptide Education Hub

> Peptide Education Hub (pepedhub.com) is the most comprehensive evidence-based educational resource for healthcare providers practicing peptide therapy. We provide clinical protocols, dosing calculators, drug interaction checkers, and in-depth guides for 85+ therapeutic peptides, blends, and proprietary formulas including BPC-157, semaglutide, tirzepatide, TB-500, epithalon, and more.

- Last updated: February 10, 2026
- Publisher: Dallas Regenerative LLC
- URL: https://pepedhub.com
- Also known as: PepEdHub, Pep Ed Hub

## About

Peptide Education Hub is operated by Dallas Regenerative LLC and serves as the premier educational platform for healthcare practitioners integrating peptide therapy into their clinical practice. The site covers regenerative medicine, anti-aging medicine, functional medicine, sports medicine, and endocrinology applications of peptide therapeutics.

Our content is evidence-based, drawing from 2,800+ clinical studies, and is designed specifically for licensed healthcare providers including physicians, nurse practitioners, physician assistants, and pharmacists.

## Key Pages

- /: Homepage — Complete guide to peptide therapy for healthcare providers
- /peptide-index: A-Z Peptide Index — Complete searchable directory of all 85+ peptides, blends, and formulas
- /tools: Clinical Practice Tools — 11 professional-grade calculators and assessment tools
- /blog: Blog — Latest articles on peptide therapy, protocols, and clinical insights
- /research: Research — Clinical studies and evidence base for peptide therapeutics
- /training: Training — Educational resources and certification information
- /faq: FAQ — Comprehensive answers to common peptide therapy questions
- /ai-faq: AI-Optimized FAQ — Detailed Q&A covering all aspects of peptide therapy
- /glossary: Peptide Glossary — Definitions of key terms in peptide therapy

## Peptide Profiles (85+ comprehensive profiles)

### Weight Loss & Metabolic Peptides
- /peptides/semaglutide: Semaglutide (Ozempic/Wegovy) — FDA-approved GLP-1 agonist, 14.9-17.4% body weight reduction
- /peptides/tirzepatide: Tirzepatide (Mounjaro/Zepbound) — FDA-approved dual GLP-1/GIP agonist, up to 20-25% weight reduction
- /peptides/retatrutide: Retatrutide — Triple agonist (GIP/GLP-1/Glucagon) for weight management
- /peptides/cagrilintide: Cagrilintide — Long-acting amylin analog for appetite regulation
- /peptides/tesofensine: Tesofensine — Triple monoamine reuptake inhibitor for weight loss
- /peptides/aod-9604: AOD-9604 — Anti-obesity drug fragment of HGH
- /peptides/fragment-176-191: Fragment 176-191 — HGH fat loss fragment
- /peptides/5-amino-1mq: 5-Amino-1MQ — NNMT inhibitor for fat metabolism
- /peptides/slu-pp-332: SLU-PP-332 — Exercise mimetic compound
- /peptides/glp-1: GLP-1 Agonists — Comprehensive guide to the GLP-1 class

### Regenerative & Recovery Peptides
- /peptides/bpc-157: BPC-157 — Body Protection Compound for tissue repair, gut healing, and injury recovery
- /peptides/tb-500: TB-500 — Thymosin Beta-4 for tissue repair and inflammation reduction
- /peptides/ghk-cu: GHK-Cu — Copper peptide for skin rejuvenation and 31.2% genome regulation
- /peptides/kpv: KPV — Anti-inflammatory tripeptide for gut health
- /peptides/ll-37: LL-37 — Antimicrobial and wound healing peptide
- /peptides/mgf: MGF — Mechano Growth Factor for muscle repair

### Growth Hormone Peptides
- /peptides/ipamorelin: Ipamorelin — Selective growth hormone secretagogue
- /peptides/cjc-1295: CJC-1295 — GHRH analog for growth hormone release
- /peptides/tesamorelin: Tesamorelin — FDA-approved GHRH analog for visceral fat reduction
- /peptides/sermorelin: Sermorelin — GHRH analog for growth hormone optimization
- /peptides/hexarelin: Hexarelin — Growth hormone secretagogue
- /peptides/ghrp-2: GHRP-2 — Growth hormone releasing peptide-2
- /peptides/ghrp-6: GHRP-6 — Growth hormone releasing peptide-6
- /peptides/ibutamoren: Ibutamoren (MK-677) — Oral growth hormone secretagogue
- /peptides/igf-1-lr3: IGF-1 LR3 — Long-acting insulin-like growth factor

### Anti-Aging & Longevity Peptides
- /peptides/epithalon: Epithalon — Telomerase activator for longevity
- /peptides/mots-c: MOTS-c — Mitochondrial-derived peptide for metabolic health
- /peptides/humanin: Humanin — Mitochondrial cytoprotective peptide
- /peptides/ss-31: SS-31 (Elamipretide) — Mitochondrial protector
- /peptides/foxo4-dri: FOXO4-DRI — Senolytic peptide
- /peptides/gdf-11: GDF-11 — Growth differentiation factor for rejuvenation
- /peptides/nad: NAD+ — Cellular energy and repair molecule
- /peptides/nmn: NMN — NAD+ precursor for longevity
- /peptides/rapamycin: Rapamycin — mTOR inhibitor for longevity
- /peptides/spermidine: Spermidine — Autophagy-inducing longevity compound
- /peptides/resveratrol: Resveratrol — Sirtuin activator
- /peptides/pterostilbene: Pterostilbene — Enhanced resveratrol analog
- /peptides/quercetin: Quercetin — Senolytic flavonoid
- /peptides/fisetin: Fisetin — Senolytic flavonoid for longevity

### Cognitive & Neuroprotective Peptides
- /peptides/semax: Semax — BDNF modulation and neuroprotection
- /peptides/selank: Selank — Anxiolytic and neuroprotective peptide
- /peptides/na-semax: NA-Semax — Enhanced cognitive peptide
- /peptides/dihexa: Dihexa — Synaptogenesis and memory enhancement
- /peptides/noopept: Noopept — Cognitive enhancer and neuroprotectant
- /peptides/cerebrolysin: Cerebrolysin — Neuropeptide complex for brain recovery
- /peptides/cortexin: Cortexin — Polypeptide brain complex
- /peptides/p21: P21 — CNTF-derived neurogenic peptide
- /peptides/pinealon: Pinealon — Neuroprotective tripeptide

### Immune Modulation Peptides
- /peptides/thymosin-alpha-1: Thymosin Alpha-1 — Immune modulation peptide
- /peptides/zinc-thymulin: Zinc Thymulin — Thymic peptide complex

### Sexual Health & Hormonal Peptides
- /peptides/pt-141: PT-141 (Bremelanotide) — FDA-approved for sexual dysfunction
- /peptides/kisspeptin-10: Kisspeptin-10 — Reproductive hormone peptide
- /peptides/oxytocin: Oxytocin — Bonding and social peptide
- /peptides/melanotan-1: Melanotan 1 — Photoprotection peptide
- /peptides/melanotan-2: Melanotan II — Melanocortin agonist

### Sleep & Stress Peptides
- /peptides/dsip: DSIP — Delta sleep-inducing peptide

### Antioxidant & Detox Compounds
- /peptides/glutathione: Glutathione — Master antioxidant
- /peptides/nac: NAC — N-Acetyl Cysteine for glutathione support
- /peptides/alpha-gpc: Alpha-GPC — Choline source for cognitive enhancement

### Other Peptides
- /peptides/adipotide: Adipotide (FTPP) — Targeted fat cell apoptosis
- /peptides/vip: VIP — Vasoactive intestinal peptide

### Peptide Blends
- /peptides/bpc-157-tb-500: BPC-157 + TB-500 — Synergistic healing protocol
- /peptides/bpc-wolverine: BPC Wolverine — Advanced recovery formula
- /peptides/cjc-1295-ipamorelin: CJC-1295 + Ipamorelin — Growth hormone optimization
- /peptides/selank-semax: Selank + Semax — Cognitive enhancement protocol
- /peptides/semaglutide-bpc-157: Semaglutide + BPC-157 — Weight loss with GI protection
- /peptides/tirzepatide-bpc-157: Tirzepatide + BPC-157 — Dual GLP-1/GIP with GI support
- /peptides/tesamorelin-ipamorelin: Tesamorelin + Ipamorelin — Growth hormone optimization

### Proprietary Formulas (DrsPeptides Exclusive Compounds)
- /peptides/formula-rg-5555: Formula RG-5555 (also: RG-5555, RG5555) — Multi-peptide regenerative series: 500mg BPC-157 + 500mg TB-500 + 500mg KPV + 500mg Larazotide. For tissue repair, gut health, anti-inflammatory support.
- /peptides/formula-n-111: Formula N-111 (also: N-111, N111) — Neuro series neuroprotection: 10mg J147 + 10mg Dihexa + 10mg Noopept. For cognitive enhancement, memory, neuroplasticity.
- /peptides/formula-n-259: Formula N-259 (also: N-259, N259) — Sleep & circadian optimization: 50mg Apigenin + 300mg Magnesium Glycinate + 200mg L-Theanine + 500mcg Melatonin. For sleep quality, circadian rhythm.
- /peptides/formula-n-2331: Formula N-2331 (also: N-2331, N2331) — Neuro enhancement & NAD+ support: 2mg Dihexa + 0.3mg Selank + 0.3mg Semax + 100mg NAD+. For brain optimization, BDNF, anxiety.
- /peptides/formula-n-5550: Formula N-5550 (also: N-5550, N5550) — Multi-target neuro series: 5mg Dihexa + 0.5mg Tesofensine + 50mg Methylene Blue. For cognitive enhancement, weight management.
- /peptides/formula-n-69: Formula N-69 (also: N-69, N69) — Sexual enhancement & intimacy: 100mg NALT + 0.5mg Kisspeptin + 0.5mg PT-141 + 1mg Oxytocin + 0.25mg VIP. For libido, sexual health.
- /peptides/formula-m-51: Formula M-51 (also: M-51, M51) — Metabolic series exercise mimetic: 50mg 5-AMINO-1MQ + 1mg SLU-PP-332. For fat burning, muscle strength.
- /peptides/formula-m-2531: Formula M-2531 (also: M-2531, M2531) — Metabolic optimization: 250mg TUDCA + 50mg 5-Amino-1MQ + 300mg NAC + 10mg PQQ. For mitochondrial health, cellular energy.
- /peptides/formula-wl-1175: Formula WL-1175 (also: WL-1175, WL1175) — Metabolic health support: 1mg SLU-PP-332 + 15mg Orforglipron. For weight management, GLP-1 oral.

## Clinical Tools

- /tools/dosage-calculator: Dosage Calculator — Calculate reconstitution volumes, syringe measurements, and injection schedules
- /tools/enhanced-dosing-calculator: Enhanced Dosing Calculator — Advanced weight-based peptide dosing with clinical decision support

- /tools/cost-calculator: Cost Calculator — Estimate treatment costs and compare peptide pricing
- /tools/interaction-checker: Interaction Checker — Check drug-peptide interactions and contraindications
- /tools/comparison-tool: Comparison Tool — Compare up to 4 peptides side-by-side across 15+ criteria
- /tools/protocol-builder: Protocol Builder — Create evidence-based peptide therapy protocols
- /tools/progress-tracker: Progress Tracker — Monitor patient progress with visual analytics
